title: Ant McPartlin and girlfriend Anne-Marie Corbett joined by Dec to watch football
text:
Ant and Dec joined by Anne-Marie Corbett at Newcastle game (Picture: Reuters)

Is there anything more wholesome than Ant McPartlin letting his girlfriend crash his football match date with Dec Donelly?

The Britain’s Got Talent hosts are regulars when it comes to watching Newcastle play, but the new addition to the duo seemed to slip right in seamlessly.

Anne-Marie was spotted looking adoringly at her beau while he cheered his team in their match against Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.

It wasn’t the most comfortable afternoon for the pair, who watched some of the match through their fingers.

Unfortunately, it wasn’t all fun and games for the ITV duo, as their team ended up losing 1-0.

Not ideal…

Ant and Dec watch in horror as Chelsea beat Newcastle (Picture: Reuters)

Declan Donnelly (left) and Anthony McPartlin watch on (Picture: Steven Paston/PA Wire)

Ant’s relationship with Anne-Marie seems to be going well, with the pair seen going on a lunch date in between the filming of Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions.

Advertisement

Advertisement

They were also seen enjoying a cosy day out at Wimbledon, where they watched Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer on Centre Court.

While Ant’s relationship with Anne-Marie appears to be going from strength-to-strength, the fallout from his split from ex-wife Lisa Armstrong reportedly continues.

A source recently claimed that Ant was denied access to the former marital home they once shared, when he tried to collect his belongings.

An insider told The Mirror: ‘Ant has a right to collect his possessions he left in the house two years ago.

‘The last time he was in the house was July, two years ago – before he went into rehab the first time. He just wants to collect his belongings at the agreed time.

‘It’s all pretty tiring now – he just wants to move on with his life,’ the insider revealed.

Ant began dating Anne-Marie shortly after his split from Lisa, whom he was married to for 11 years.

description: In a cute little date night (plus Dec), Ant brought girlfriend Anne-Marie Corbett along to watch Newcastle play Chelsea in the Premier League.
